To meet the borough’s pressing needs the council will promote development proposals in locations across the borough, particularly where they support housing delivery, and work with the community and stakeholders to support the principles of sustainable development and good growth. This will be achieved through: a. promoting the majority of the borough’s growth towards: i. the borough’s site allocations where significant development opportunities are identified;
